Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/18th
ShortDescription: NB 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/18th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Austin/Garfield
ShortDescription: SB 91 Austin buses temp. rerouted via Austin, Garfield Street, Lombard, Fillmore, Harvey, Roosevelt, and Austin: due to, construction near Austin/Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Garfield Street, Lombard, Fillmore, Harvey, Roosevelt, and Austin, due to street blockage near Austin/Garfield.
